Reviews.Title: Highly Recommend
Reviews.Author: Alexander The Great "Aca"
Reviews.Content: Don't waste your time on junk or over pay for digital signs. This all-in-one solution is the right price and works like it should.

ProductInfo.Features:
Easy to use Digital Signage package. The screen, media player and software communicate seamlessly.
Screen rated by manufacturer for 65,000 hours of continuous use (that's over 7 years if never turned off).
Auto On/Off by schedule saves energy and Player Internal Wi-Fi allows for remote management.
Powerful web-based presentation management software included for life.
Includes a stand or is also 200x200 VESA Mountable.
ProductInfo.Name: Digital Signage Wi-Fi HD All-in-one Turnkey Package (32-Inch 720p)
